feed.title: BORIS is an easy-to-use event logging software for video/audio coding and live observations.

entry.title: 2025-11-13: Release of version 9.7.6
entry.content: The version 9.7.6 is available. Fixed issue #907 and improved the macOS version.
entry.summary: The version 9.7.6 is available. Fixed issue #907 and improved the macOS version

entry.title: 2025-11-13: Release of version 9.7.7
entry.content: The version 9.7.7 is available. Improved the macOS version (still experimental).
entry.summary: The version 9.7.7 is available. Improved the macOS version (still experimental)
